1.title: The New Normal
1.plot: In the season 9 premiere, everyone is adjusting to the news that Lucas Lyons is indeed alive, and this revelation is bringing some estranged family members home.

2.title: Miss Me With That Bull-Ish
2.plot: Ryan is baffled by Jared's confession and is determined to get to the bottom of what is really going on; meanwhile, Sherrí struggles with how to move forward with the Lyons clan including her sons.

3.title: Oh What A Tangled Web We Weave
3.plot: Shayquan cannot seem to shake Quentin, who is determined to make a permanent mark in her life no matter what; meanwhile, as Sherrí, Noah, and Jonah seek a resolution, Ryan seeks the truth from Sean, which could lead to dire consequences.

4.title: I Wish Upon A Star... I Wonder Where You Are
4.plot: Shayquan cannot seem to shake Quentin, who is determined to make a permanent mark in her life no matter what; meanwhile, as Sherrí, Noah, and Jonah seek a resolution, Ryan seeks the truth from Sean, which could lead to dire consequences.

5.title: Diggin' The Scene, Diggin' On You, Diggin' On Me
5.plot: Noah looks for a way of escape putting Jonah in an awkward position; meanwhile, as Damien continues to dig, Shayquan's professor seems to be digging her - a little too much.

6.title: Gonna Make This A Night To Remember
6.plot: Shayquan receives an unexpected invitation; meanwhile, Noah continues to push it to the limit.

7.title: Baby, Baby, Baby
7.plot: Shayquan deals with the unique offer she was presented with by the professor and her husband while still enduring Quentin's presence around the family; meanwhile, as Noah continues his downward spiral which could lead him to trouble, Aisha's secret is exposed.

8.title: Fix My Life
8.plot: Keysha gets a surprise when she visits her family in Dallas; meanwhile, as Damien makes a discovery, Sherrí makes a tough decision when it comes to Noah.

9.title: Dying Of Thirst
9.plot: The aftermath of the shooting hits Sherrí hard bringing a loved one back home; meanwhile, Shayquan's suspicions towards Quentin continues as revelations and dark secrets are revealed.

10.title: I'm Coming Home
10.plot: In the season 9 finale, the background of Quentin and William Lyons' "lookalike" is revealed; meanwhile, decisions are made that could change the course of everyone's lives.

1.title: Dawn of a New Day
1.plot: After the sudden death of their father, the Lyons siblings gather together for the funeral, but tension rises which causes for a difficult transition.

2.title: Saturday
2.plot: As the Lyons' siblings continue to cope with the death of their father, Sherrí continues her affair while Keysha continues to worry and reach out to J.C.

3.title: Back, Back, Forth and Forth
3.plot: The Lyons siblings have their first therapy session which recalls past emotions and events from the last few days.

4.title: So Gone
4.plot: A.J., an old friend of the Lyons family, comes to town to visit and seems to have his eye on Keysha.

5.title: Kissing You Is All That I've Been Thinking Of
5.plot: Things between Norman and Sherrí continue to heat up, Keysha is worried that she may yield to temptation; meanwhile, Detective Cameron Willis continues to try to solve the case of William Lyons' murder.

6.title: Daddy Dearest
6.plot: The Lyons family throws a party in honor of their father's birthday which brings up different memories for each of the siblings.

7.title: Coming Home
7.plot: As Keysha gets the shock of her life, Sherrí is taken to the edge.

8.title: No B.S.
8.plot: Things come to crashing halt when each of the Lyons' siblings and those around them either make decisions or find out information that could change the course of their lives forever.

1.title: Do I Ever Cross Your Mind... Anytime
1.plot: The Lyons family must deal with the aftermath of the events of last night as try to piece together the remaining pieces of life as they know it.

2.title: New Faces, New Places
2.plot: Angel continues to be harassed by Rodney about the paternity of Leesy; meanwhile, J.C. begins chemotherapy.

3.title: Back to Life, Back to Reality
3.plot: Luke and Keysha are at a crossroads in dealing with Norman after learning his father killed theirs; meanwhile, Jasmine and Angel struggle with hiding the truth.

4.title: Got an Icebox Where My Heart Is a Stereo
4.plot: Luke begins to spiral out of control with life as a single man; meanwhile, Sherrí meets her new boss.

5.title: 4 AM to 5 O'Clock in the Morning
5.plot: Keysha finds out the truth while Vincent Covington tries to face his; meanwhile, Sherrí calls on Luke.

6.title: Torn in Between the Two
6.plot: Xavier's life continues to go in a downward spiral causing Keysha to feel the effects of it; meanwhile, Luke's birthday opens up the door for other folks' secret problems to possibly be resolved.

7.title: Tell Me How I'm Supposed to Breathe with No Air
7.plot: The true paternity of Leesy is revealed; meanwhile, Keysha searches for Xavier.

8.title: Fallin'
8.plot: The Lyons siblings receive devastating news which brings one of their own back home.

1.title: Apologize, It's Too Late
1.plot: Six months later after Lucas' death, the Lyons siblings try to figure out what's next; meanwhile, a new visitor comes to town ready to cause some trouble.

2.title: Rolling in the Deep
2.plot: The Lyons siblings await the results of the DNA test; meanwhile, Noah continues to act out which has Sherrí concerned.

3.title: Watch Me, Watch You, Watch Him
3.plot: Ryan's jealousy becomes visible; meanwhile, Sherrí's cousin moves back to Augusta which may cause some confusion among the circle.

4.title: Soulmate
4.plot: Ryan remembers the events that led up to his late fiancé's death on the anniversary of the day of her death; meanwhile, Sherrí and Desmond continue to get closer despite the family's warnings.

5.title: Eat, Pray... And Pray Some More
5.plot: Lance wants to meets Raven's family which has Raven nervous; meanwhile, Keysha is determined to prove that Desmond is a fraud.

6.title: Ready or Not...: Part 1
6.plot: Things begin to intensify for Ryan when his family is threatened; meanwhile, Keysha receives a shocking revelation.

7.title: ...Here I Come: Part 2
7.plot: Secrets are revealed as everyone comes to grips with who they really are.

8.title: We Found Love in a Hopeless Place
8.plot: Charles and Eric must deal with the aftermath of their affair being exposed, and it takes a different affect on everyone involved.

9.title: Papa Was a Rolling Stone
9.plot: As Raven prepares for her big wedding day, J.C., Keysha, Ryan, and Sherrí must make tough decisions.

1.title: Sweet Dream, Beautiful Nightmare
1.plot: Keysha deals with the aftermath of her decision, four months after AJ's proposal. J.C. and Ashley try to balance their new lives with their new little one on the way. Everyone gears up for Gabby's first birthday party.

2.title: L-O-V-E and Affection
2.plot: As Keysha continues to drink her sorrows away, Raven is still stressing over Gabby's party receiving some unexpected help; meanwhile, the battle between J.C. and Ashley heats up.

3.title: We Can't Be Friends
3.plot: Noah and Jonah may not be too happy with Sherri's new friend; meanwhile, family members and friends come together for Gabby's first birthday party as one family member brings a big surprise.

4.title: Got a Secret, Can You Keep It?
4.plot: Ryan returns to some unanswered questions from his siblings; meanwhile, Sherri gets an unexpected opportunity.

5.title: The Other Side of Me
5.plot: Charles and Tammi are trying to go to counseling in order to prepare their marriage after Charles' infidelities, but Tammi may be hiding a secret of her own.

6.title: Game, Set, Match
6.plot: Tammi continues her affair with Trip, but her trust in him leads him to another family connection; meanwhile, as Ashley starts wearing out her welcome at Keysha's, Malcolm and Aisha continue to inch closer to finding the money.

7.title: He's My Brother, and I Love Him Like Myself
7.plot: While Delilah's past seems to be catching up to her, Ryan and Sean finally come face-to-face; meanwhile, Sherri continues to deal with her rocky relationship with Noah.

8.title: A Thin Line Between Love and Hate
8.plot: The battle between Raven and Eric wages on while Noah's attitude puts Sherri over the edge; meanwhile, Sean confronts Shayquan, but Bobbi's lies may soon catch up with her.

9.title: Tide Is High... But I'm Holding On
9.plot: Keysha continues to try and connect the dots with what obviously seems to be another secret from William's past. Meanwhile, Trip makes a decision that could impact Malcolm and Aisha.

10.title: Pour Up (Drink) Headshot (Drink) Faded... Faded...
10.plot: As Charles' world continues to come crashing down, Tammi makes a life-altering decision; meanwhile, Keysha makes a bold move towards Nigel.

11.title: Save Me
11.plot: While Sherri is dealing with the aftermath of shooting Malcolm, Delilah gets a blast from the past; meanwhile, Keysha has a revelation.

12.title: Love and War
12.plot: It all comes to an explosive end as loved ones return home, and some could be saying goodbye for good.

1.title: Love After War
1.plot: While J.C. digests the news of having another son, Keysha is shocked with the return of her estranged husband, Xavier; meanwhile, a dead body is found.

2.title: When It All Falls Down
2.plot: Keysha continues to adjust to Xavier being back home; meanwhile, as Ryan tries to move on, J.C. hits a nerve with Ashley when he tries to include Tiffany and Micah in their lives.

3.title: Goodbye... Farewell... See You Later
3.plot: The Lyons family says goodbye to another family member; meanwhile, Ashley makes a bold move.

4.title: I'ma Put It Down... We Gon Fall in Love
4.plot: J.C. figures out what to do after Ashley abandons their baby; meanwhile, Ryan is hiding Delilah's return from Bobbi.

5.title: You Say Goodbye, and I'll Say It Too
5.plot: Sherri continues to try and mend her relationship with Noah and Jonah while she finally confronts Malcolm; meanwhile, a confession is made.

6.title: On to the Next One
6.plot: Sherri continues to try and mend her relationship with Noah and Jonah while she finally confronts Malcolm; meanwhile, a confession is made.

7.title: If You Don't Want Me, Then Don't Talk to Me
7.plot: Kiera and Malcolm's relationship is exposed; meanwhile, Nigel tries his hands at being a father-figure to Noah and Jonah.

8.title: It's My Party and I'll Fight If I Want To
8.plot: Vincent makes a surprise return for Jonah's birthday party, but things take a turn for the worse when old feelings return; meanwhile, Sean makes a move.

9.title: If You Look at My Life, You'll See What I See
9.plot: Sean travels to Virginia to visit his birth mother, and he ends up meeting his half-brothers as well.

10.title: You Are, You Are the Love of My Life
10.plot: Shayquan has another encounter with Phylicia as her relationship with Joshua comes to a head; meanwhile, another familiar face returns to Augusta.

11.title: Resolution
11.plot: All the Lyons siblings come together for a shocking revelation.

12.title: Happily Ever After
12.plot: As Ryan returns to an old love, Raven and J.C. decide to take the next step in their lives as they prepare for the next chapter; meanwhile, Keysha gets an unpleasant surprise from Malcolm.

13.title: So Long, Farewell, to You My Friend
13.plot: Keysha must decide what's next for her while her siblings are moving on with their lives.

1.title: Starting Over
1.plot: It's been 2 years since most of the Lyons siblings said goodbye to Augusta, GA, and each of them have moved on with their lives following the traumatic years of dealing with the death and secrets of William Lyons, but as Sherri deals with a devastation, Sean may be in trouble.

2.title: The Struggle Is Real
2.plot: Sean tries to work his way back into his ex-girlfriends' lives; meanwhile, Aisha and Malcolm must deal with the revelation that Malcolm has a son.

3.title: Don't Kill the Fun
3.plot: Tammi continues to notice that Sherri is not willing to face reality while Angel soon realizes she'll have to come face-to-face to Sherri about her financial issues; meanwhile, Bobbi and Sean confront the past.

4.title: I Don't Need You... But I Want You
4.plot: Sean finds himself at Sherri's during his round of visits, but he must continue to confront his demons with Bobbi; meanwhile, Jamie's cover could soon be compromised.

5.title: Settle for My Love
5.plot: Bobbi has to deal with her lapse of judgment with Sean; meanwhile, Sherri continues to struggle with the aftermath of her relationship with Nigel.

6.title: It's the Past That Haunts Us...
6.plot: Sherri and Keysha remember the moments that led up to where they are now in their lives; meanwhile, Bobbi goes to see Ryan.

7.title: But It's the Future That Taunts Us
7.plot: While Talia makes a mysterious move, Keysha begins to worry about Jamie's whereabouts; meanwhile, as Bobbi and Sean continue to try and run from their transgressions, someone from the past appears to be in deep trouble.

8.title: Don't Let Me Fall
8.plot: Keysha returns to Augusta to receive a couple of shocks that will change her "new" life; meanwhile, Sherri tries to make amends with Angel.

9.title: Dark Shadows
9.plot: Keysha deals with catching Jamie kissing Talia; meanwhile, Sherri decides to take action.

10.title: Promise That You Will Sing About Me
10.plot: In the season 6 finale, everything comes to a dramatic head as Bobbi finds out if she's pregnant or not, Jamie reveals his motives to Keysha, Jared and Chase are both placed in compromising positions, and Sean and Sherri lives will never be the same after identities are revealed.

1.title: Lucas
1.plot: In the season 7 premiere, Sherri is still in shock after the revelation that Lucas Lyons is alive; meanwhile, Shayquan and the rest of the Lyons siblings await the news of Sean's fate.

2.title: A New Reality
2.plot: The Lyons family must deal with Sean's new reality; meanwhile, Sherri must make good on Lucas' demand.

3.title: Everything Is Everything
3.plot: While Keysha could be having second thoughts, Delilah returns forcing Ryan and Bobbi to make a decision about their future; meanwhile, as Sherri has a revelation, a mysterious stranger shows up in Sean's hospital room.

4.title: Baby, You're Stuck With Me
4.plot: Noah makes a new friend, which may put Sherri in a position to interact with someone she may not necessarily want to be around; meanwhile, as Sean is still adjusting to his present reality, Keysha takes on the role of Xavier Jr.'s mother.

5.title: Wherever You Are Is Wherever I Have To Be
5.plot: Keysha worries about the custody of Xavier, Jr. when Xavier's brother rolls into town demanding rights for his family, Sherri and Allen may be beginning to bond, Shayquan gets some backup when it comes to Sean, and a Lyons returns home.

6.title: For The Love Of Money
6.plot: While Keysha must make a decision in regards to Xavier, Jr., Malcolm finally meets MJ; meanwhile, Jared and Sheri are hit with separate bombshells.

7.title: That's Me Right There
7.plot: Jared's secret is in danger of coming into light after on of his clients appears at his parents' house for dinner; meanwhile, a surprise dinner rings Sherri and Allen closer.

8.title: Legacy
8.plot: Sherri and Keysha enter unfamiliar territory; meanwhile, as Bobbi's suspicions towards Jared continues to grow, Shayquan and Angel may be growing apart.

9.title: It's Is We Is Or Is We Ain't
9.plot: Keysha and Sherri both struggle with possibly moving forward with their potential suitors.

10.title: Letting Go. Moving On.
10.plot: In the season 7 finale, Sean decides to move on which pushes Bobbi to make an impulsive decision, Jared faces his father, Keysha is in limbo when it comes to her relationship with Caleb, a blast from the past returns shocking both Sherri and Allen, and paternity results are revealed.

1.title: Dear Keysha
1.plot: In the season 8 premiere, months later, Keysha tries to regain some sense of normalcy beginning with her relationship with Caleb, but Shayquan and Aisha have their reservations; meanwhile, Bobbi welcomes two unwanted guests.

2.title: Get Out, Right Now, It's The End Of You And Me
2.plot: Shayquan and Aisha's patience is wearing thin as Caleb continues to wear out his welcome; meanwhile, Sherri makes a decision about Allen.

3.title: Not Me. Not Today.
3.plot: As Natasha and Bobbi have a showdown, Jared has a trick up his sleeve; meanwhile, as Keysha tries to move forward, Noah confronts Sherri.

4.title: It's A Family Affair
4.plot: Keysha pays a surprise visit to some beloved family members; meanwhile, as Aisha is on the hunt for the truth, Bobbi exposes a big secret.

5.title: Ooh, What A Night
5.plot: Shayquan and Aisha try online dating; meanwhile, Sherri prioritizes her life.

6.title: Tell Him Boy Bye
6.plot: Keysha continues to contemplate what her life will be like if Cliff turns out to be her birth father; meanwhile, Shayquan and Aisha realize that they have commonalities with their former friends.

7.title: I'm Sick And Tired Of That Loose Rap
7.plot: Sean is ready to take the next step, but there may be a delay in his plans; meanwhile, as Angel and Shayquan begin to mend, Bobbi takes a final stand in her feud with her brother.

8.title: What You Say To Me
8.plot: Sean and Natasha battle it out after the truth is revealed; meanwhile, as Sherrí reminisces about the past, Keysha begins to put the pieces together when it comes to what really happened to Rebecca.

9.title: I'm Just Confessing... All The Things I Did
9.plot: Caleb makes a confession, and Aisha learns how to let go.

10.title: Breaking News
10.plot: In the season 8 finale, Keysha and the others are dealing with the aftermath of Caleb's confession; meanwhile, a major arrest will change everything.
